TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 類別之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的方法委派時，會呼叫就會引發事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a event is raised. 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式 Web 組件事件加`OnDisplayModeChanging`屬性``項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanging` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
